pages.text: $(li)The Luck of the Sea enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/fishing_rod)Fishing Rod$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the possibilities of obtain good loot by fishing.
pages.title: Luck of the Sea

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_luck_of_the_sea)Ancient Tome (Luck of the Sea)$(/l).
